Displacement,velocity and time

30 Sep 2014

Vectors and Scalars

  • Vectors

    • magnitude/size and direction
    • displacement -- 5 meters to the left
    • velocity -- 5/2 m/s to the left

  • Scalars

    • magnitude/size
    • distance -- 5 meters
    • speed -- 5/2 m/s

A brick moves 5 meters in 2 seconds.
